heading: Acknowledgements
text:
editable text component code
derived “CtxEdit” used Inter samples website
(GitHub repo) Rasmus Andersson.
main change disabled dynamic tracking feature
parameters (font size, tracking, line height) decoupled sample text.

heading: 1 Charter
text: https://practicaltypography.com/charter.html

heading: 1.1 Specimen
text:
Emma Woodhouse, handsome, clever, rich, 
comfortable home happy disposition, seemed unite best
blessings existence; lived nearly twenty-one years 
world little distress vex .youngest two daughters affectionate,
indulgent father; , consequence sister’s marriage, 
mistress house early period. mother died 
long ago indistinct remembrance 
caresses; place supplied excellent woman 
governess, fallen little short mother affection.Sixteen years Miss Taylor Mr. Woodhouse’s family, less 
governess friend, fond daughters, particularly
Emma. intimacy sisters. Even
Miss Taylor ceased hold nominal office governess,
mildness temper hardly allowed impose 
restraint; shadow authority now long passed away, 
living together friend friend mutually attached,
Emma just liked; highly esteeming Miss Taylor’s
judgment, directed chiefly .real evils, indeed, Emma’s situation power 
rather much way, disposition think little 
well ; disadvantages threatened alloy 
many enjoyments. danger, however, present unperceived,
means rank misfortunes .Sorrow came—gentle sorrow—shape 
disagreeable consciousness.—Miss Taylor married. Miss Taylor’s
loss first brought grief. wedding-day 
beloved friend Emma first sat mournful thought 
continuance. wedding , bride-people gone, father 
left dine together, prospect third cheer
long evening. father composed sleep dinner, 
usual, sit think lost.

heading: 13 Cascadia Code
text: https://github.com/microsoft/cascadia-code/releases/tag/v2111.01

heading: 13.1.1 R
code:
"Il1|" >= "0Oo"

library("ggsci")
library("ggplot2")

data("diamonds")

p <- ggplot(
  subset(diamonds, carat > 2.2 & depth > 55 & depth < 70),
  aes(x = depth, fill = cut)
) +
  geom_histogram(colour = "black", binwidth = 1, position = "dodge") +
  theme_bw()

p + scale_fill_rickandmorty()

heading: 13.1.2 Python
code:
import cvxpy as cp
import numpy as np

m = 20
n = 15
np.random.seed(1)
A = np.random.randn(m, n)
b = np.random.randn(m)

x = cp.Variable(n)
cost = cp.sum_squares(A @ x - b)
prob = cp.Problem(cp.Minimize(cost))
prob.solve()

print("\nThe optimal value is", prob.value)
print("The norm of the residual is ", cp.norm(A @ x - b, p=2).value)

import cvxpy as cp

n = 15

b = np.random.randn(m)
